class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        diff = [abs(nums[i] - nums[n - 1 - i]) for i in range(n // 2)]
        count = collections.defaultdict(int)
        for i in range(n // 2):
            count[diff[i]] += 1
        c = sorted(count.items(), key=lambda x:(-x[1], x[0]))
        x_max = [0] * (n // 2)
        for i in range(n // 2):
            a, b = min(nums[i], nums[n - 1 - i]), max(nums[i], nums[n - 1 - i])
            x_max[i] = max(diff[i] + a, diff[i] + k - b)
        x_max.sort()
        # 凡是<= x_max[i]的都只需要1次，严格大于的需要2次
        res = n // 2
        for x, count in c:
            idx = bisect_left(x_max, x)
            res = min(res, idx * 2 + (n // 2 - idx) - count)
        return res

        # 若差值和x不一样，若diff[i] + a < x and diff[i] + (k - b) < x，则需要修改2次
        # 否则只需要修改一次
